DOC.criteria: 1 . ≥18 year 2 . PS=0,1,2 3 . Patients diagnose histologic , cytologic diagnosis extensive small cell lung cancer 4 . Patients receive Etoposide combine platinum base firstline chemotherapy 6 cycle evidence show patent PR/CR/SD 5 . Expected lifetime > 12 week 6 .
